basics.name: Kevin Kelly
basics.title: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Kevin is an experienced software engineer with a specialization in web applications. He excels at developing solutions in new fields, and is a strong leader and mentor for software development.

work.name: StealthPath, Inc.
highlights: Team lead and lead front-end developer for a cyber-security provisioning application built with ReactJS, GraphQL, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL.
Managed and mentored web application development efforts for a team of 5 application developers.
Designed and built OSI Layer 2/3/4 filtration functionality in C/C++ to provide  network security in both operating system kernel and user space.
Performed requirement derivation, design documentation, and task allotment for various efforts.

work.name: Axios, Inc.
highlights: Lead web developer for a signal processing effort. Developed and maintained the real-time thin-client application for configuration, visualization, and analysis of the processing server.
Lead developer of the open-sourced Ozone IWC, a JavaScript framework for real-time web application communication in the browser without server middleware.
Created thin-client tools, web applications, web servers, and interactive web tutorials.
Implemented build task automation with various tools including Webpack and Grunt.
Mentored JavaScript efforts including real-time data streaming and data visualization.

work.name: Thales Defense and Security, Inc.
highlights: Developed a networked android application for data logging and debugging interfaced devices.
Developed commercial android applications for various device sizes in an agile-based effort.
Performed FPGA analysis for migration compatibility and power consumption.

work.name: Virginia Tech, AUVT
highlights: Developed visual detection algorithms with OpenCV to aid an autonomous submarine in navigation.

volunteer.organization: Potomac Falls High School Math Honors Society
highlights: Developed a web application that utilizes QR-scanning for attendance taking.
Built using AngularJS, NodeJS, Express.js, MongoDB (MEAN).
